scripts.cypress:test:staging: CONFIG_FILE=staging NO_COLOR=1 CYPRESS_ENV=true cypress run --env TAGS="@e2e-staging"
scripts.cypress:test:production: CONFIG_FILE=production NO_COLOR=1 CYPRESS_ENV=true cypress run --env TAGS="@e2e-production"
scripts.cypress:test:jenkins: CONFIG_FILE=jenkins NO_COLOR=1 CYPRESS_ENV=true cypress run --env TAGS="@integration"
scripts.cypress:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.visdiff:test: NO_COLOR=1 CYPRESS_ENV=true percy exec -- cypress run --config videos=false --spec **/vizdiffs/*.feature --env configFile=staging
